description: Scenarios must cover happy path, edge cases, and error cases based on acceptance criteria. Example: Valid input → success; Boundary value → validates; Invalid input → error message.

do.description: Cover all case types: happy path, edge cases, error cases. Example: User enters valid data → success; User enters boundary → validates; User enters invalid → error

example: Scenario: User enters valid data - When user submits valid form Then system saves successfully
Scenario: User enters boundary value - When user enters maximum allowed value Then system validates correctly
Scenario: User enters invalid data - When user submits empty form Then system shows validation error

dont.description: Don't skip case types. Example: Only happy path scenarios (missing edge and error cases)

example: Only 'User submits valid data' scenario - MISSING edge cases and error cases

guidance.description: Don't assume error handling is implicit
example: No explicit error scenarios - must show what happens when things fail
